Author: Mohamed Baioumy - MSFT
Summary: This runbook sizing an elastic pool set Maximum DTUs utilized by all databases in the pool  . And set Maximum storage bytes utilized by all databases in the pool. You can look up the available characteristics   and tiers on https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/sql-database/sql
Title: Sizing an Elastic Pool eDTU and Storage resources
UserTags: Windows Azure SQL Database, Azure Automation, Graphical Runbook
